TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationProperty extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表屬性或組態項目的子系。

span.span: Represents an attribute or a child of a configuration element.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在簡單的情況下，例如`CustomSection`下一個範例所示物件代表屬性例如`fileName`。In the case of a simple , such as the `CustomSection` shown in the next example, the objects represent attributes such as `fileName`. 在更複雜的組態項目，例如執行個體包含子區段，區段`authentication`、物件可代表以及屬性的物件。In the case of more complex configuration elements such as a section containing subsections, for instance `authentication`, the objects can represent objects as well as attributes. 類別代表集合可能是其中一個屬性的物件或組態項目的物件。The class represents the collection of the objects that can be either attributes or objects of a configuration element. 類別代表個別的組態設定。The class represents an individual configuration setting. 這個類別可讓您取得或設定名稱、 類型和特定組態實體 （屬性或元素） 的預設值和指定屬性是必要、 項目索引鍵，或代表預設項目集合。This class allows you to get or set the name, type, and default value for a particular configuration entity (attribute or element) and specify whether the attribute is required, is an element key, or represents a default element collection. ## Examples 1. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用當您建立自訂的區段。The following code example shows how to use the when you create a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/CS/ConfigurationProperty.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/VB/ConfigurationProperty.vb#1)] 以下是上一個範例中的程式碼所使用的組態檔案的摘錄。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file used by the code in the previous example. 下列範例會示範如何建立程式碼中的上一節。The following example shows how to create the previous section in code. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/CS/ConfigurationProperty.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/VB/ConfigurationProperty.vb#30)]

block.para:
每個物件會建立內部集合這些物件表示的項目屬性或子元素的集合。Every object creates an internal collection of objects that represents either the element attributes or a collection of child elements.
包含非自訂的資訊和功能所提供物件屬性。Non-customizable information and functionality is contained by an object provided by the property.
您可以使用程式設計或宣告式 （使用屬性） 的程式撰寫模型來建立自訂組態項目。You can use a programmatic or a declarative (attributed) coding model to create a custom configuration element.
- 程式設計模型。Programmatic Model. 此模型，您必須建立屬性，以針對每個項目屬性，以取得及/或將其值設定，並將它加入至基礎的內部屬性包基底類別。This model requires that you create a property for each element attribute to get and/or set its value and add it to the internal property bag of the underlying base class.
- 宣告式模型。Declarative Model. 這個簡單的模型，也稱為屬性化的模型，可讓您透過使用屬性定義元素屬性，並以屬性加以裝飾。This simpler model, also called attributed model, allows you to define an element attribute by using a property and decorate it with attributes. 這些屬性會指示 ASP.NET 組態系統有關的屬性類型和其預設值。These attributes instruct the ASP.NET configuration system about the property types and their default values. 這項資訊，透過反映，取得與 ASP.NET 組態系統會為您建立的項目屬性的物件，並執行必要的初始化。With this information, obtained through reflection, the ASP.NET configuration system creates the element property objects for you and performs the required initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您具現化物件使用這個建構函式，和屬性會設為`false`。When you instantiate a object using this constructor, the and properties are set to `false`. 此外，這個建構函式以建立執行個體將不會做為預設集合索引鍵屬性。Additionally, an instance made with this constructor will not function as a default collection-key property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式來具現化組態屬性物件。The following code example shows how to use the constructor to instantiate a configuration-property object. summary.span: 表示在序列化時是否會查詢組態屬性的父組態區段，以判斷組態屬性是否應該序列化為 XML。

span.span: Indicates whether the configuration property's parent configuration section is queried at serialization time to determine whether the configuration property should be serialized into XML.

value.span: 如果應該查詢父組態區段，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the parent configuration section should be queried; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要建立的組態屬性[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]或更新版本中，不應該將屬性值序列化為 XML，舊版 framework 為目標時，如果將此屬性設定為`true`。If you are creating a configuration property for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later versions, and if the property value should not be serialized to XML when an earlier version of the framework is targeted, set this property to `true`. 您使用設定此屬性，當您呼叫的建構函式，其中包含參數。You use to set this property when you call a constructor that includes a parameter.
